org.pircbotx

Class TrustingSSLSocketFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.net.SocketFactory
      • javax.net.ssl.SSLSocketFactory
        • org.pircbotx.TrustingSSLSocketFactory
  • Deprecated. 
    This class has been superseded by UtilSSLSocketFactory, which provides much more flexibility and ease of use. This class is kept for backwards compatability only.

    @Deprecated
public class TrustingSSLSocketFactory
extends SSLSocketFactory
    An SSLSocketFactory implementation that treats all certificates as valid. Use with care.
    Author:
    Originally by: Kjell Arne Brudvik from brudvik.org

    Implemented and Maintained in PircBotX by: Leon Blakey

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TrustingSSLSocketFactory()
      Deprecated. 
      Create a new SSLSocketFactory factory that will create Sockets regardless of what certificate is used.
